statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, name, drivers_license_number FROM customer_information;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name FROM customer_information ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM customer_information WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE drivers_license_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, contact_details FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM customer_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information
SELECT name, contact_details FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM rental_agreement_records WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT agreement_id, rental_amount FROM rental_agreement_records ORDER BY rental_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, drivers_license_number FROM customer_information
SELECT name, contact_details FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, name, drivers_license_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_agreement_records WHERE rental_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT customer_id, name, start_date, end_date, rental_amount FROM customer_information JOIN rental_agreement_records ON customer_information.customer_id = rental_agreement_records.customer_id WHERE name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT customer_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM customer_information INNER JOIN rental_agreement_records ON customer_information.customer_id = rental_agreement_records.customer_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customers WHERE license_number='123456';
SELECT customer_id, name, contact_number, license_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_agreements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_id, start_date, end_date FROM rental_agreements WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, name, contact_number, license_number FROM customers;
SELECT agreement_id, start_date, end_date, customer_id FROM rental_agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT rental_id, amount_due, payment_status, agreement_id FROM rentals WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customers WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agreement_id, start_date, end_date, customer_id FROM rental_agreements WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, contact_number FROM customers;
SELECT item_id, item_name, rental_price FROM rental_items ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_agreements WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT full_name, rental_fee FROM customers c JOIN rental_records r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT agreement_id, rental_fee, rental_date FROM rental_records

SELECT customers.full_name, rental_agreements.rental_date, rental_items.item_name FROM customers INNER JOIN rental_agreements ON customers.customer_id = rental_agreements.customer_id INNER JOIN rental_records ON rental_agreements.agreement_id = rental_records.agreement_id INNER JOIN rental_items ON rental_records.item_id = rental_items.item_id
SELECT full_name, drivers_license FROM customers WHERE drivers_license IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT item_name, rental_price FROM rental_items WHERE rental_price > 50 ORDER BY rental_price ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rental_agreements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT customer_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_history ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT c.name, v.make, v.model FROM customers c JOIN rental_agreements ra ON c.id = ra.customer_id JOIN vehicles v ON ra.vehicle_id = v.id WHERE ra.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vh.customer_id, c.name, vh.rental_date, vh.return_date FROM rental_history vh JOIN customers c ON vh.customer_id = c.id ORDER BY vh.rental_date DESC LIMIT 5;
